author: Jordan Brower
description: Yes, yes, yes, the name, "All Jacked Up" was inspired by the use of 100Â° proof bottled-in-bond applejack but I've committed sacrilege by using calvados. In the quest for roundness, I also very slightly played down the fernet from the original recipe. Hopefully, the result is still uplifting.
name: All Jacked Up

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice)
